==Installation==

<ol>
<li>Unzip the CbModel zip and move the extracted directory in the _libraries_ directory           of Processing.</li><br/>  
<li>Restart Processing.</li><br/>
<li>Import the library to any of your programs that use the CbModel library:
Sketch -> Import Library and select CbModel.</li>  
</ol> 
<br/>

You can find reference of library's functions <a href="http://code.google.com/p/cbmodel/wiki/package-summary">here</a>.<br/>
